amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds for USDA's Equity Commission.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Agriculture Department's Equity Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 216 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 216 (Roll no. 418).
